description: A shell script that manages downloading, extracting, installing, verifying, and uninstalling application packages, including version management and signature verification.

methods.name: downloadApp
methods.description: Downloads application package using applicationDownload function.

methods.name: extractApp
methods.description: Extracts application package archives and performs sanity checks.

methods.name: installApp
methods.description: Installs application by placing files in the designated directory, extracting package contents, and handling metadata.

methods.name: verifyAppSignature
methods.description: Calls an external script to verify the app's digital signature.

methods.name: postVerifyInstall
methods.description: Copies metadata and executes post-install scripts if available.

methods.name: uninstallApp
methods.description: Removes installed application directories for the given app and version.

methods.name: updatePkgStatus
methods.description: Updates the package status via broadcast with information about the current package.

methods.name: updatePackage
methods.description: Coordinates downloading, extracting, installing, verifying, and post-installation steps for a specific app version.
